name: +1x2
description:
+1x2 is a super simple clicker game. Just click anywhre to get profit. You can use these money to improve your power by one or multiply it by two. Plus one is temporary upgrade, multiplication by two is permanent. The second upgrade works like a prestige. It resets all money and plus upgrades.

Your goal is to reach the quadrillion value. And +1 or x2 are the only options you have. Good luck!

  • Nice gameplay
  • Nice graphics
  • Completable goals
  • Three achievements
  • 11 languages support
  • Refund friendly (please don't)
